name: globe
description: World Economic Map - Interest rates, inflation, and exchange rates visualization

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.setup: npm run migrate && npm run seed && npm run ingest
scripts.setup:prod: npm run migrate && npm run seed
